name: BeatRun!
description: BeatRun! is a game built in Godot Engine using only assets made by me with Blender, GarageBand, Audacity and some other tools, I used some sprites from opengameart.org. This game consists only in clicking the heart on the beat with the shiny star, its just a simple videogame but I've tested my skills in making assets from scratch, hope you like it, my plans are to enhance the graphics, include some  more content and maybe publish it :P
